tswitem.name: Invulnerable Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Invulnerable Augment Resonator
An unattuned support augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give your team a beneficial effect that heals once for 20/ 40/ 60/ 80/ 100 and decreases damage taken by 1%/ 1%/ 2%/ 3%/ 3% for 5 seconds when you activate this ability. This can only happen every 30 seconds.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Curing Augment Resonators
  • 48 Pure pentagram runes
  • 48 Pure koru runes
